author: svakulenk0
description:
Dataset Card for QReCC: Question Rewriting in Conversational Context
	


	
		
		Dataset Summary
	

QReCC (Question Rewriting in Conversational Context) is an end-to-end open-domain question answering dataset comprising of 14K conversations with 81K question-answer pairs. The goal of this dataset is to provide a challenging benchmark for end-to-end conversational question answering that includes the individual subtasks of question rewriting, passage retrieval and reading comprehension.â€¦ See the full description on the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/svakulenk0/qrecc.
